Jadi Lelucon di Pesta Halloween Seleb, Melly Goeslaw 'Ngamuk'
01 Nov 2019, 09:57 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Melly Goeslaw murka mengetahui dirinya jadi bulan-bulanan oleh rekan sesama selebriti. (Foto: Detikcom/Ismail)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Selebriti Melly Goeslaw murka ketika mengetahui dirinya dijadikan bahan canda di acara Halloween yang digelar oleh rekannya sesama selebriti. Ia mengungkapkan kemarahan melalui unggahan di Instagram pada Kamis (31/10) malam.Melly mengunggah ulang video dari akun solois Vidi Aldiano yang menampilkan artis Bubah Alfian yang berdandan seperti Melly Goeslaw, mengenakan kostum terusan bermotif bunga-bunga, hijab, serta topi putih. Di video tersebut, Vidi menyebut akun Bubah, solois Rossa, serta Bunga Citra Lestari."IG saya gak dibajak, saya emang lagi marah, marah banget," tulis Melly di unggahan yang kini sudah dihapus itu."Selama ini pesta kostum yang mengatasnamakan saya, saya gak pernah marah karena selalu di-present [ditampilkan] dengan baik, gak asal-asalan dan malah jadi bahan ketawaan yang konyol. Buat saya, ini bullying. Terserah kalau bagi kalian ini lucu. Buat saya gak lucu sama sekali. Saya repost IG Story nya tadi malam, supaya follower saya juga tahu, bukan cuma follower kalian saja,""Semoga kalian belajar lebih peka, kan Tuhan kasih hati bukan buat dekorasi badan doang, tapi buat dipakai supaya peka. Saya gak anggap ini bercanda loh, biarpun semalam itu judulnya pesta kostum, tapi tetap aja dalam rangka Halloween, saya bukan hantu woooy, biar lo kata semalam ada yang jadi Atta [Halilintar] lah, jadi KD lah, bodo amat,""Orang bisa suka atau gak suka dengan cara kalian berpesta, dan harus ada yang kayak saya berani negor kalian, sebagaimana kalian berani ketawa-ketawain orang yang jadi saya di muka umum dan di medsos. Saya doain semoga kalian gak mengalami hal yang sama seperti saya, sepele buat kalian tapi dalem banget buat saya,""Dan saya GAK SUKA. Dah bagus cuma saya taruh di feed, gak saya urek-urek itu UU ITE dan pasal perbuatan kurang menyenangkan," kata Melly.


Ungkapan kemarahan Melly Goeslaw usai mengetahui dirinya dijadikan bahan lelucon di pesta Halloween. (screenshoot via Instagram/melly_goeslaw)

Ia menambahkan, bahwa dalam Halloween kali ini, selebriti Kourtney Kardashian pun berdandan seperti Ariana Grande. Namun menurutnya, hal itu dilakukan dengan baik sehingga tidak menjadi bahan tawa.Di akhir unggahan, Melly menulis ia tak mau memperpanjang masalah ini. Yang terpenting baginya, ia telah melepas hal yang memancing amarah."Gak usah diperpanjang, forgive and forget, yang penting saya udah nyatakan SAYA GAK SUKA, titik," ujar Melly seraya berkata akan mendoakan rekan-rekannya.Suami Melly, musisi Anto Hoed segera angkat bicara membela istri. Berbeda dengan sang istri, Anto berbicara lebih tegas soal peran UU ITE. Unggahan di Instagram pribadinya berbunyi, "As Salam Sohibul. Alhamdulillah Allah memberi saya yang lebih baik dari sekadar wanita, bahkan lebih indah dari hanya sebuah intan berlian, emas, atau apapun yang dianggap berharga.""Dan saya sangat MENCINTAI wanita ini, karena Allah Ta'ala mengirimkan pada saya sebagai teman hidup seiman. Terima kasih ya Allah. Di sisi lain, apa yang Allah hadiahkan pada saya juga menjadi bahan TERTAWAAN yang hebat,""Dengan kata lain, mereka menertawakan apa yang telah Allah ciptakan dan Allah hadiahkan pada saya dan anak-anak saya. Innal lillahi wa inna illaihi roji'un. Kami bukan siapa-siapa, kami hanya rakyat biasa, tetapi semut pun akan mengambil sikap ketika hendak terinjak,""Tentu kami akan dengan senang hati mengambil sikap. Negara ini mempunyai UU yang melindungi warganya, yaitu UU ITE. Selamat bertanggung jawab. Saya mencintai apa yang telah Allah berikan sebagai separuh jiwa saya," tulis Anto.



Unggahan Anto Hoead tersebut pun ramai mendapat respons, termasuk oleh Melanie Subono yang mengunggah ulang ungkapan kekecewaan Anto itu di fitur Story Instagram.


Melanie Subono menunjukkan dukungannya kepada Melly Goeslaw dan Anto Hoed. (screenshoot via Instagram/melaniesubono)

Melanie menambahkan, "Indah, mas @antohhoed. Mimpi saya berikutnya saya dan pasangan bisa jadi seperti kalian. Sabar ya Teh @melly_goeslaw, gak semua orang otak dan rasanya dipakai saat diciptakan dan diberikan." (rea)

Becoming a Joke at Celebrity Halloween Party, Melly Goeslaw 'Raging'
01 Nov 2019, 09:57 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Melly Goeslaw was furious to find out that she had been a target for celebrities. (Photo: Detikcom / Ismail)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Celebrity Melly Goeslaw was enraged when she found out she was made a joke at a Halloween event held by her fellow celebrity. He expressed anger through uploading on Instagram on Thursday (31/10) night. Jelly re-uploaded a video from soloist Vidi Aldiano's account that featured the artist Bubah Alfian who dressed up like Melly Goeslaw, wearing a floral, hijab, and white hat dress. In the video, Vidi mentions the account of Bubah, soloist Rossa, and Bunga Citra Lestari. "My IG was not hijacked, I am indeed angry, really angry," Melly wrote in the now deleted upload. "During this costume party in my name. , I have never been angry because I always present it [displayed] well, not careless and instead become ridiculous laughter material. For me, this is bullying. It's up to you if it's funny. For me it's not funny at all. IG Story last night, so that my followers also know, not just your followers, "" Hopefully you learn to be more sensitive, don't you, God, love not for body decoration, but for use to be sensitive. I don't think it's a joke, even though Last night the title was a costume party, but still in the framework of Halloween, I'm not a ghost woooy, let you say last night there was Atta [Lightning], so KD, very bodo, "" People can like or not like the way you party. , and someone must like I dare you negor, as you dare to laugh at the people who become me in public and in social media. I pray that you guys won't experience the same thing as me, it's trivial to you guys but it is very deep to me, "" And I DO NOT LIKE. It's good that I just put it in the feed, I didn't bother with the ITE Law and the article on deeds was not fun, "Melly said.


Melly Goeslaw's angry expression after knowing she was used as a joke at a Halloween party. (screenshoot via Instagram / melly_goeslaw)

He added, that in Halloween this time, celebrity Kourtney Kardashian also dressed up like Ariana Grande. But according to him, it was done well so that it did not become laughter. At the end of the upload, Melly wrote that she did not want to prolong this problem. Most important for him, he has let go of things that provoke anger. "No need to be extended, forgive and forget, the important thing is I've stated I DO NOT LIKE, period," Melly said as he said he would pray for his colleagues. Husband Melly, musician Anto Hoed soon speak up in defense of the wife. Unlike his wife, Anto spoke more assertively about the role of the ITE Law. His personal Instagram post reads, "As Salam Sohibul. Thank God Allah gave me something better than just a woman, even more beautiful than just a diamond, gold, or whatever was considered valuable." "And I really LOVE this woman, because God The Exalted sends me as a partner in the faith. Thank you, O Allah. On the other hand, what Allah has given me is also a wonderful LAUGHTER, "" In other words, they are laughing at what Allah created and Allah gave to me and my children. Innal lillahi wa inna illaihi roji'un. We are nobody, we are just ordinary people, but even the ants will take a stand when they want to be stepped on, "" Of course we will be happy to take a stand. "I have a law that protects its citizens, namely the ITE Law. Happy responsibility. I love what God has given me as half of my soul," wrote Anto.



Anto Hoead's upload was also swiftly responded, including by Melanie Subono who reuploaded the expression of Anto's disappointment in the Instagram Story feature.


Melanie Subono showed her support for Melly Goeslaw and Anto Hoed. (screenshoot via Instagram / melaniesubono)

Melanie added, "Beautiful, mas @antohhoed. My next dream is that I and my partner can be like you guys. Be patient, @melly_goeslaw tea, not everyone's brain and the taste is used when created and given." (rea)
